name: Photobirb
description:
# Game type

Photobirb is a memory game!
Challenge yourself rembembering birbs and train your memory.

# Story

You are an ornithologist who has just arrived to Birb Island, a legendary island where all birbs nest.

Your job is to take a photo of all 14 rare birb species.

Watch out! The film is limited, so you can only afford 3 duplicate photos.

Try to remember the birbs you've already photographed!

# Commands

WASD: Movement
Left click next to a birb: take a photo.

# Creators

Carmelo Ventimiglia | @memel06
Game Design, Code, Audio

Paola Collorafi | @ponyo21
Game Design, Art, Testing
